title: Flipped Learning-Based Economics Pedagogy Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: An environment requiring elementary education leaders in corporations to strengthen economic education design and implementation competencies, maximizing offline interactions in a smartphone-centric constrained technological setting.

learning_goals: Learners can design economics lessons with over 80% accuracy by applying the flipped learning model
Learners can integrate and utilize at least three types of digital/non-digital materials (images, videos, text) for delivering economic concepts
Learners revise and supplement developed lesson plans at least twice through peer feedback before final submission
Learners can improve their teaching methods in three aspects based on formative assessment results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
